meanings.definition: A person who complains or grumbles.
meanings.sent1: The grumblers in the office always find something to complain about.
meanings.sent2: The group of grumblers gathered to discuss their dissatisfactions.
meanings.sent3: The grumblers at the park made everyone laugh with their constant complaints.
meanings.sent4: The grumblers in the neighborhood were like a broken record, always grumbling.
meanings.sent5: The image of the grumblers stuck in my mind, always grumbling about everything.

meanings.sent1: She grumblers about the weather every single day.
meanings.sent2: They grumblers about the service at the restaurant throughout the meal.
meanings.sent3: He grumblers so much that it becomes almost comical.
meanings.sent4: The engine grumblers like an old man waking up from a nap.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the grumblers filled the room, echoing their discontent.
